name: Swarm of Rats
conimmunities: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The swarm has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Swarm
traits.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny rat. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

actions.name: Bites
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. Hit: 7 (2d6) piercing damage, or 3 (1d6) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.
